name: 100! Block Jewel: Puzzle Ultimate Gems
description:
A simple but addictive puzzle block jewel game.
The goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Don't forget to keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.
So join this jewels world! This game is seriously fun, super addictive and we can’t promise you will not fall in love with our awesome and delicious adventure!
